it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful.authenticationManager

Class PublicKeyTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful.authenticationManager.PublicKeyTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PublicKeyTimerInterface

    public class PublicKeyTimer
extends java.lang.Object
implements PublicKeyTimerInterface
    This stateless EJB provide a timer that is to be scheduled right after a key pair is created. When the timer will exceed the key pair (NB. public and private ) will be considered exceeded and so removed from the database

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.ejb.SessionContext ctx
      Context in which the timer is to be scheduled
      private static long TIMER_MILLISECONDS_DURATION

      PublicKeyTimer()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void scheduleSingleTimer(RSAEncryption rsaEncryption)
      Schedule a timer relative to a RSA key pair
      void timeoutHandler(javax.ejb.Timer timer)
      When the timer exceed it removes from the database the key pair class
